file_content.text: Safeties overloaded. Primary weapon inoperable. Recommend immediate evacuation.
This is Battlelord Kreshan to all personnel--rally to section zero! We fight for our homeworld and the Supreme Warmaster!
This is Battlelord Kreshan to the intruders. This station is capable of pulverizing continents--do you think it will fall to a single strike team? Pure arrogance.
This is Battlelord Kreshan to all personnel. Our jealous rivals would destroy our great weapon--but today, the Advozse Hegemony earns its place in the galaxy!
Intruders detected! Hammer Station security online... lockdown in progress.
